mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments (student_id, payment_date, amount, year_month, status) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{paymentDate}, #{amount}, #{yearMonth}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE payments SET student_id = #{studentId}, payment_date = #{paymentDate}, amount = #{amount}, year_month = #{yearMonth}, status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE year_month = #{yearMonth} ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM payments WHERE year_month = #{yearMonth}
